All Classes

Class Summary
Class Description
FileHandler
The class FileHandler handles the files/URLs chosen in Menu and converts the text to an ArrayList.
Menu
The class Menu provides the UI for the program and directs program flow.
Runner
The class Runner calls on Menu class to begin program.
Shinglizer
Shinglizer converts strings contained in an ArrayList to shingled text.
TextComparator
The class TextComparator compares the Map objects generated by subject and query texts and returns the cosine similarity of strings in those Map objects.
TextProcessor
The class TextProcessor processes ArrayLists to Map objects through threaded operations.
